net.sf.sprockets.content

Class EasyCursorLoader

  • java.lang.Object
    • android.content.Loader<D>
      • android.content.AsyncTaskLoader<D>
        • net.sf.sprockets.content.CursorWrapperLoader<EasyCursor>
          • net.sf.sprockets.content.EasyCursorLoader
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    LocalCursorLoader

    public class EasyCursorLoader
extends CursorWrapperLoader<EasyCursor>
    Wraps the loaded cursor in an EasyCursor.
